Experience



Hiab, Finland

Robotic Software Developer @ Automous Technologies Team

Manager: Dr. Juho Vihonen

I focus on autonomous load handling systems, with a particular emphasis on human-robot collaboration. My work involves designing intuitive user interfaces using Qt, ensuring the systems are safe to operate, and mitigating foreseeable issues to enhance both efficiency and reliability.

August 2023 - Present

Nokia Bell Labs, Finland

MGraduate Research Fellow@ ML Methods and Applications Team

Supervised by: Dr. Murtaza Hazara and Dr. Mikko Honkala (in collaboration with Dr. Alberto Ortiz Rodriguez (UIB))

The objective of my thesis research was to study the effectiveness of hierachical reinforcement learning in joint navigation and manipulation of mobile manipulators. The deevloped solution successfully performed whole-body manipulation to reach a target location outisde the reach of the manipulator.

February 2023 - July 2023

Nokia Bell Labs, Finland

Research Intern @ ML Methods and Applications Team

Supervised by: Dr. Rinu Boney and Dr. Mikko Honkala

The research project was a collaboration between two teams at Nokia Bell Labs -Espoo, Finland and Murray Hills, USA. The objective was to compare the performance of ROS local planners against vision-based reinforcement learning agents for the navigation of mobile robots.

May 2022 - October 2022

Eindhoven University of Technology (TU/e), the Netherlands

Research Intern @ Department of Soft Tissue Biomechanics & Tissue Engineering

Collaborated with: Dr. Janine Grolleman

January 2022 - May 2022

Åbo Akademi University, Finland

Research Assistant @ Åboat. Project

Supervised by: Dr. Sepinoud Azimi and Dr. Sebastien Lafond

Åboat is a project of Åbo Akademi's Faculty of Natural Sciences and Technology, which is led by the Department of Information Technology. Novia University of Applied Sciences (Mast Institute) is also involved in research and development work
